function.name: recommand_travel_destination
function.description: recommends places for users to travel. It doesn't work when user told to plan the trip

question.description: bring the user's question about place recommendation.

location.description: The area of Korea, e.g. 서울 or 부산 or 대구

question.description: bring the user's question about place recommendation.

location.description: The city of Korean, e.g. 서울 or 부산 or 대구

duration.description: the duration of the travel plans, If the user does not specify the duration of the trip, you should ask specifically about the duration of the trip. e.g. 하루, 1박 2일, 2박 3일
